attributes.action: Strip Lord John Kilclooney of his title and seat in the house of lords
attributes.additional_details: A sitting member of the house of lords referred to the U.S. vice-president elect as "the Indian" in a demonstrably racist and diminishing tweet, unacceptable behaviour for a peer to use such language about a duly and democraticly elected world leader
attributes.background: Remove a demonstrably racist man from his seat in one of our country's highest chambers
